name: get_range_of_verses
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool al_quran.
Tool description: Quickly retrieve original Arabic text, translation, transliteration and Word Search from the Koran /Quran
API description: Fetches a collection of Ayahs/Verses from a specific chapter/surah of the Quran along with original Arabic text, translation, transliteration, and verse ID in JSON format using the RapidAPI service.

chapterid.description: The ID of the chapter/surah to retrieve.

range.description: The range of verses to fetch (e.g., "1-10").
